features: [ ALL-IN-ONE FACIAL CLEANSER ] One-step skin care for daily facial cleansing, face and eye makeup removal while providing long-lasting hydration. Gently removes dirt, excess oil, and even long-wear makeup and daily SPF sunscreen residue

[ CREAM CLEANSER TO FOAMING CLEANSER ] Dispenses as a rich cream and transforms into a foam as you lather into skin. Non-drying formula, thoroughly cleanses without stripping skin of moisture or leaving a tight, dry feeling

[ DRY SKIN FACE WASH ] Formulated with hyaluronic acid and amino acids to support skin's Natural Moisturizing Factors (NMF), known to attract and retain moisture. Suitable for normal to dry skin. Fragrance free, non-comedogenic, and pH balanced

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products, formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II)to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.

[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS & #1 DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED SKINCARE BRAND ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.
body.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Hydrating Cream-to-Foam Facial Cleanser has a unique one-step cleansing formula with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) that gently cleanses, thoroughly removes oil and makeup, and hydrates the skin barrier. This creamy foaming face wash begins as a cream before transforming to a soft foam when you begin to lather it on the skin with water.•Fragrance-free•Paraben-free•Soap-free•Non-comedogenic•Skin-identical pH•Suitable for normal to dry skin and sensitive skinKey Ingredients:•Amino Acids: Helps attract and hold water on the skin•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin's surface and helps the skin retain moisture•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Ceramides help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cream to Foam Transforming Texture This cleanser dispenses as a rich cream and transforms into a foam as you lather into skin. This one-step product cleanses, hydrates, and removes makeup. How to Use Wet skin with lukewarm water. Massage cleanser into skin in a gentle, circular, motion. Rinse. Suitable for Normal to Dry Skin Types All CeraVe products are developed with dermatologists. Cream to Foam Cleanser is formulated without fragrance and isnon-comedogenic, allergy-tested & phbalanced. It is suitable for normal to dry skin types. Amino Acids, Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides Ceramides are naturally found in your skin and play a vital role in helping your skin protect you. They help fill in the gaps between your skin cells so your skin can seal in moisture and seal out impurities. Hyaluronic Acid helps retain skin's natural moisture. Amino Acids help support skin's Natural Moisturizing Factors (NMF), known to attract and retain moisture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for hydration and gentle cleansing
reviews.reviewText: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser is a product I've been using for a while, and I'm happy to provide an honest review based on my experience.First and foremost, one of the standout features of this face wash is its hydrating properties. It lives up to its name, as it leaves my skin feeling moisturized and not stripped of its natural oils. This is particularly important for me, as I have normal to dry skin. I don't experience that tight, dry feeling after using it, which is a common issue with many other cleansers.The texture of the product is smooth and creamy, and it lathers well. A little goes a long way, so the bottle lasts for a good amount of time, making it a cost-effective choice.One of the key ingredients, ceramides, is known for its ability to help repair the skin's natural barrier. This feature is especially appealing for those with sensitive or damaged skin. The product is also fragrance-free, which is a big plus for those who are sensitive to scents or have allergies.However, it's worth noting that if you wear heavy makeup, you might need an additional makeup remover, as this cleanser may not fully remove all makeup residue in one go. Yes, it won't work in this caseIn summary, CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser is an excellent choice for people with dry or sensitive skin. It does exactly what it claims by cleansing without over-drying and contributes to improved skin hydration over time. While it may not be the best for makeup removal, it's a reliable, affordable, and gentle cleanser that I continue to use and recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Revitalize Your Skin with CeraVe Hydrating Cream-to-Foam Cleanser
reviews.reviewText: This is my 2nd time purchasing the CeraVe Hydrating Cream-to-Foam Facial Cleanser and I have to say, I am thoroughly impressed with this product. Developed with dermatologists, this cleanser has a unique formula that effectively cleanses, removes makeup, and hydrates the skin barrier all in one step.One of the things I love most about this cleanser is that it's fragrance-free, paraben-free, and soap-free, making it suitable for even the most sensitive skin types. Its skin-identical pH ensures that it won't disrupt your skin's natural balance, which is a huge plus in my book.The key ingredients in this cleanser are also impressive. Amino acids help attract and hold water on the skin, while hyaluronic acid attracts hydration to the skin's surface and helps it retain moisture. The patented MVE technology continuously releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration, which is a game-changer for anyone with dry skin.But perhaps the star ingredient in this cleanser is the ceramides. Ceramides help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier, which is crucial for healthy, radiant-looking skin. I've noticed a significant improvement in the texture and overall appearance of my skin since using this cleanser.The creamy texture of the cleanser transforms into a soft foam when lathered with water, making it easy to apply and rinse off. It effectively removes dirt, oil, and makeup without leaving my skin feeling tight or dry.Overall, I highly recommend the CeraVe Hydrating Cream-to-Foam Facial Cleanser to anyone looking for a gentle, hydrating cleanser that effectively removes makeup and impurities while restoring and maintaining the skin's natural barrier. It's perfect for normal to dry skin types and anyone with sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great clean without being too drying
reviews.reviewText: I love this cream to foam face wash. Feels great on my skin. No detectable scent (very sensitive to smells), cleans my face of all makeup but doesn't leave it dry. This is my second time buying it and I went for the large size this time. I've being recommending this to all my family and friends because it's rare to find an affordable face cleaner that does a good job of cleaning without leaving skin totally parched. 10 stars if I could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good and affordable
reviews.reviewText: I've been using CeraVe Hydrating Cream-to-Foam Cleanser for a few weeks now, and I'm genuinely impressed. As someone with sensitive skin, finding the right cleanser has always been a challenge, but this product has been a game changer. It's super gentle, doesn't strip my skin, and leaves it feeling soft and hydrated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lack of foam but hydrates great
reviews.reviewText: This product hydrates your skin very well. It makes you fell fresh. And it doesn't irritate sensitive skin like mine. But it doesn't foam well. Which isn't exactly a problem. More foamy would be nice is all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great facial cleanser.
reviews.reviewText: Almost immediately after starting to use CeraVe Hydrating Cream-to-Foam cleanser, I noticed my face was less dry and looked so much more refreshed. Much younger appearance. Nice product, highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and effective
reviews.reviewText: This is a very gentle cleanser that still gets all of my makeup off. I have recently started double-cleansing, which made me nervous at first because I don't want to irritate my skin. However, with this facewash, I am not worried at all, it was very easy to incorporate into my routine and helps keep my skin extra clean, fresh, and hydrated!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Go-To Hydration Hero
reviews.reviewText: I can't rave enough about the CeraVe Hydrating Cream – it's my absolute go-to for achieving that perfect hydration. This cream has become an essential part of my skincare routine, thanks to its deeply nourishing formula that leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft and moisturized. It effortlessly tackles dryness without any greasy residue, making it ideal for both day and night use.The inclusion of essential ceramides in this cream not only hydrates but also strengthens the skin barrier, promoting long-lasting moisture. What sets CeraVe apart is its non-comedogenic nature, ensuring my skin stays clear and healthy. Plus, the fragrance-free formula makes it gentle and suitable for sensitive skin.The convenient pump dispenser is a game-changer, making application mess-free and allowing me to control the amount I need. With consistent use, I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's texture and overall hydration levels.In summary, if you're in search of a reliable, hydrating cream that ticks all the boxes, look no further than CeraVe. It's truly a skincare staple that I can't imagine my routine without. Five stars without a doubt!
